verbs.description: Donald Trump 's personal attorney Michael Cohen [V: will] plead the Fifth Amendment to avoid self - incrimination in a law suit brought by Stormy Daniels , a court was told Wednesday .

Donald Trump 's personal attorney Michael Cohen will plead the Fifth Amendment to avoid self - incrimination in a law suit brought by Stormy Daniels , a court [V: was] told Wednesday .
